QueryResult.text: SELECT pi.portfolio_id portfolio_key, pi.portfolio_id clarity_portfolio_key, p.code portfolio_id, p.name portfolio_name, pi.investment_id investment_key, i.code investment_id, i.name investment_name, pi.created_date clarity_created_date, pi.last_updated_date last_updated_date FROM pfm_investments pi INNER JOIN pfm_portfolios p ON pi.portfolio_id = p.id INNER JOIN inv_investments i ON pi.investment_id = i.id WHERE 1=1
